oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter from Pvt. Mack Mitchell Bennett to his brother, PFC Curtis Scott "Bannie" Bennett
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pvt. Mack Mitchell Bennett (1892-1951) served in Btry. F, 318th F.A. Regt., 81st Div. during World War I. The letter, written on Camp Jackson letterhead, is addressed to his brother, Curtis Scott "Bannie" Bennett, in Huntingdon, Tennessee. He writes that "Bannie" will be leaving for the military soon as well. His brother was promoted to private first class during his service with the Guard Co, 108th Army Service Corps.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
